bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition brought forth jointly by a joint invasion, of a condition of yang depletion, of wind and cold evil with aching joints, swelling and distension, and in serious causes impairment of mobility. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 7: 腎氣虛弱，臥冷濕當風得之。不 時速治，喜流入脚膝，或為偏枯冷痹，緩弱疼重 , “If the kidney qi is depleted and weak, and if one lies down in a cold and moist place and happens to be affected by wind, this must be treated very soon. [The wind] tends to flow into the legs and knees. In some cases it generates hemilateral withering with cold blockage , slackening, weakness, pain and a feeling of heaviness”.
